name: Perfect Black Solid #002
description:
002 DUAL POLYTOPE Hexahedron & Octahedron
Hexahedron meet the double of the perfect black cube

Artwork by Ryak
Sound design by Mr. Pepper

Perfect black was created as black square artwork on Blackout Tuesday and that was just the beginning of project about beauty of essential forms and superiority of simplicity that must overcome all obstacles of modern society

💥 Our project are open for Collectors and Collaborators 💥

As a collector you can get collect several perfect black gems and produce creating new ones that becomes composed from which you own

Get into a universe full of perfection with physical simplicity and limitless forms
